stimulusHtml: Which of the following actions would a government take when regulating a natural monopoly to produce the socially optimal quantity?
choicesHtml: Impose a lump-sum tax on the monopolist’s profit.
Impose a per-unit tax on the monopolist’s profit.
Open the market for competition to lower the monopoly price.
Regulate the monopoly to charge a price equal to the average total cost.
Grant a lump-sum subsidy to the monopoly.
